Name: Grand Sour
Ingredients: 60 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer optional
Instructions: DRY SHAKE all ingredients (without ice). SHAKE again with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: The rich cognac and orange flavours of Grand Marnier shine in this balanced and flavoursome sour.
Nutrition: One serving of Grand Sour contains 169 calories
